name: B. Yaroslav and Two Strings
statement:
Yaroslav thinks that two strings and , consisting of digits and having
length are non-comparable if there are two numbers, and , such that and
. Here sign represents the -th digit of string , similarly, represents
the -th digit of string .A string’s template is a string that consists
of digits and question marks ("").Yaroslav has two string templates,
each of them has length . Yaroslav wants to count the number of ways to
replace all question marks by some integers in both templates, so as to
make the resulting strings incomparable. Note that the obtained strings
can contain leading zeroes and that distinct question marks can be
replaced by distinct or the same integers.Help Yaroslav, calculate the
remainder after dividing the described number of ways by .
